Html:
This has been nagging at me for quite a while, but I keep forgetting to say anything about it. :)

 

The bear druid model allows you to sort and optimize for Overall rating, Survival, Threat, or Mitigation. I would really, really love an option for sorting/optimizing based on Survival + Mitigation while ignoring Threat. There are a number of fights (Thorim and Freya come to mind) where threat is simply never an issue, and I'd love to be able to examine and optimize pure incoming damage-related figures as a result.  Mind you, I still enjoy the existing Survival and Mitigation split, so please don't get rid of that, I'm just interested in adding another option.
You already can do this. See the options tab. Set the value of Threat to 0.
Oh, dur. Of course. Thanks, I don't know why I didn't think of that.
